title: Empty Streets
text:
Empty Streets is the debut album by the <a href="Americans">American</a> <a href="house%20%28music%29">house</a> group <a href="Late%20Night%20Alumni">Late Night Alumni</a>, released through <a href="Hed%20Kandi">Hed Kandi Records</a>. It was released physically in the UK on August 29, 2005.
The lead single from the album of the same name, "Empty Streets", was released in September 2005 and it features remixes by <a href="Seamus%20Haji">Haji & Emanuel</a>, <a href="Kaskade">Kaskade</a> and <a href="Aurora%20%28electronica%20band%29">Aurora</a>. The Haji & Emanuel remix was featured in <a href="Ti%C3%ABsto">Tiësto</a>'s compilation album "" (without crediting it as a remix) and, at the time, became one of the series' most downloaded tracks. Kaskade remade the song for his 2010 album "<a href="Dynasty%20%28Kaskade%20album%29">Dynasty</a>".
